capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry about the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher and he mentioned that Hagrid is still in charge of the Hogwarts grounds. capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Hagrid is a really important figure in the wizarding world, especially when it comes to the Hogwarts school. As the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher, he's always been someone who puts himself between danger and his students. I mean, can you imagine if he hadn't been there to protect us all those times? The fact that he was also the one in charge of the Forbidden Forest and the hunting ground is just a testament to his bravery and responsibility.
